name: Rabbit Blast Mania
description:
Freddie the Rabbit's magic hat has gone haywire and is filling the valley with plastic balls! Help him disenchant all items spawned from the hat!

  • Ball - 10 points
  • Freddie the Rabbit - 50 points

Game ends when the ball pit reaches the red ribbon of the magic hat. What's the highest score you can reach?

***NOTE: This is an early access version of the game, provided while performance optimizations are being completed. Any donations are appreciated.
